com.adaptinet.messaging
Class Address

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.adaptinet.messaging.Address
public final class Address
extends java.lang.Object

The Address class represents a source or destination URL of a peer.

          Constucts an empty Address object with the default (http) preffix

getRoute

public Address getRoute()
If the peer sits behind a firewall all messages will have to be routed through. This will allow another peer to post messages through the firewall utility.
